channel.title: Invisible inventory models
channel.description: I Want to add models above 15000 or 20000 and i have no clue what to do. Don't say put them between 8000 and 15000 i don't want to do that i want to load more then that. also i have already increased my model index and it preloads the models but when i get in game and pickup the item inventory/wield/drop models are all invisible and when i drop it i cant pick it back up or for that matter see it :| and if i log out and try to log in i get an exception in "Thread-8"arrayindexoutofboundsexeption: 78904 and WOW seriously i missed that big flaming message at the top of the board telling me not to post this here my apologies...

item.title: Invisible inventory models
item.dc:creator: @demon_fox337 demon fox337
item.description:
@demon_fox337 wrote:

I Want to add models above 15000 or 20000 and i have no clue what to do. Don’t say put them between 8000 and 15000 i don’t want to do that i want to load more then that. also i have already increased my model index and it preloads the models but when i get in game and pickup the item inventory/wield/drop models are all invisible and when i drop it i cant pick it back up or for that matter see it and if i log out and try to log in i get an exception in "Thread-8"arrayindexoutofboundsexeption: 78904 and WOW seriously i missed that big flaming message at the top of the board telling me not to post this here my apologies…
